## Description {#details}

Implementation of uniformity analysis.

The algorithm is a fixed point iteration that starts with the assumption that all control flow and all values are uniform. Starting from sources of divergence (whose discovery must be implemented by a CFG- or even target-specific derived class), divergence of values is propagated from definition to uses in a straight-forward way. The main complexity lies in the propagation of the impact of divergent control flow on the divergence of values (sync dependencies).

NOTE: In general, no interface exists for a transform to update (Machine)UniformityInfo. Additionally, (Machine)CycleAnalysis is a transitive dependence, but it also does not provide an interface for updating itself. Given that, transforms should not preserve uniformity in their getAnalysisUsage() callback.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Construct a specially modified post-order traversal of cycles.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The ModifiedPO is contructed using a virtually modified CFG as follows:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 1 The successors of pre-entry nodes (predecessors of an cycle</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    entry that are outside the cycle) are replaced by the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    successors of the successors of the header.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 2 Successors of the cycle header are replaced by the exit blocks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    of the cycle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Effectively, we produce a depth-first numbering with the following</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// properties:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 1 Nodes after a cycle are numbered earlier than the cycle header.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 2 The header is numbered earlier than the nodes in the cycle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 3 The numbering of the nodes within the cycle forms an interval</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    starting with the header.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Effectively, the virtual modification arranges the nodes in a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// cycle as a DAG with the header as the sole leaf, and successors of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the header as the roots. A reverse traversal of this numbering has</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the following invariant on the unmodified original CFG:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    Each node is visited after all its predecessors, except if that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    predecessor is the cycle header.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/modifiedpostorder"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ContextT&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/modifiedpostorder/#a6b92d7feb5e5c058eb9ba6db008789f0">ModifiedPostOrder</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/modifiedpostorder/#a99fd9d54d2ca5017c7b8b9ec398e105c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/modifiedpostorder/#a99fd9d54d2ca5017c7b8b9ec398e105c">appendBlock</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/modifiedpostorder/#afc452825fd333dc01eb5a1b37354f465">BlockT</a> &amp;BB, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/modifiedpostorder/#a50a222b48855deffe881b083c744fe0d">isReducibleCycleHeader</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">    POIndex&#91;&amp;BB&#93; = m&#95;order.size();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;ModifiedPO(&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; POIndex&#91;&amp;BB&#93;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/modifiedpostorder/#a50a222b48855deffe881b083c744fe0d">isReducibleCycleHeader</a>)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/modifiedpostorder/#ab4a9bc32c0d59ee77d2108f243ba68f7"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/modifiedpostorder/#ab4a9bc32c0d59ee77d2108f243ba68f7">getIndex</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/modifiedpostorder/#afc452825fd333dc01eb5a1b37354f465">BlockT</a> &#42;BB)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(POIndex.count(BB));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> POIndex.lookup(BB);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ReducibleCycleHeaders.contains(BB);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl">SmallPtrSetImpl&lt;const BlockT &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;Finalized);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> computeStackPO(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;const BlockT &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;Stack,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/modifiedpostorder/#a8bc31818aae64ab0909917ca395f7e1a">CycleInfoT</a> &amp;CI, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/modifiedpostorder/#a2db63b11220d5a0ec5680ff7a1a134b0">CycleT</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a60dc5ae8be8d73033ce099677e645b9b">Cycle</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight">DivergencePropagator;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\class GenericSyncDependenceAnalysis</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\brief Locate join blocks for disjoint paths starting at a divergent branch.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// An analysis per divergent branch that returns the set of basic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// blocks whose phi nodes become divergent due to divergent control.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// These are the blocks that are reachable by two disjoint paths from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the branch, or cycle exits reachable along a path that is disjoint</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// from a path to the cycle latch.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// --- Above line is not a doxygen comment; intentionally left blank ---</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Originally implemented in SyncDependenceAnalysis.cpp for DivergenceAnalysis.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The SyncDependenceAnalysis is used in the UniformityAnalysis to model</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// control-induced divergence in phi nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -- Reference --</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The algorithm is an extension of Section 5 of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   An abstract interpretation for SPMD divergence</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       on reducible control flow graphs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Julian Rosemann, Simon Moll and Sebastian Hack</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   POPL &#39;21</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -- Sync dependence --</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Sync dependence characterizes the control flow aspect of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// propagation of branch divergence. For example,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %cond = icmp slt i32 %tid, 10</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   br i1 %cond, label %then, label %else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   br label %merge</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// else:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   br label %merge</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// merge:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %a = phi i32 &#91; 0, %then &#93;, &#91; 1, %else &#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Suppose %tid holds the thread ID. Although %a is not data dependent on %tid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// because %tid is not on its use-def chains, %a is sync dependent on %tid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// because the branch &quot;br i1 %cond&quot; depends on %tid and affects which value %a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is assigned to.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -- Reduction to SSA construction --</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There are two disjoint paths from A to X, if a certain variant of SSA</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// construction places a phi node in X under the following set-up scheme.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This variant of SSA construction ignores incoming undef values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// That is paths from the entry without a definition do not result in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// phi nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       entry</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     /      \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    A        \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  /   \\       Y</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// B     C     /</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  \\   /  \\  /</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    D     E</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     \\   /</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       F</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Assume that A contains a divergent branch. We are interested</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in the set of all blocks where each block is reachable from A</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// via two disjoint paths. This would be the set &#123;D, F&#125; in this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// case.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To generally reduce this query to SSA construction we introduce</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a virtual variable x and assign to x different values in each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// successor block of A.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           entry</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         /      \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        A        \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      /   \\       Y</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// x = 0   x = 1   /</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      \\  /   \\  /</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        D     E</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         \\   /</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           F</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Our flavor of SSA construction for x will construct the following</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//            entry</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//          /      \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         A        \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       /   \\       Y</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// x0 = 0   x1 = 1  /</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       \\   /   \\ /</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     x2 = phi   E</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         \\     /</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         x3 = phi</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The blocks D and F contain phi nodes and are thus each reachable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by two disjoins paths from A.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -- Remarks --</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; In case of cycle exits we need to check for temporal divergence.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   To this end, we check whether the definition of x differs between the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   cycle exit and the cycle header (&#95;after&#95; SSA construction).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; In the presence of irreducible control flow, the fixed point is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   reached only after multiple iterations. This is because labels</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   reaching the header of a cycle must be repropagated through the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   cycle. This is true even in a reducible cycle, since the labels</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   may have been produced by a nested irreducible cycle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; Note that SyncDependenceAnalysis is not concerned with the points</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   of convergence in an irreducible cycle. It&#39;s only purpose is to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   identify join blocks. The &quot;diverged entry&quot; criterion is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   separately applied on join blocks to determine if an entire</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   irreducible cycle is assumed to be divergent.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; Relevant related work:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     A simple algorithm for global data flow analysis problems.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; if BlockLabels&#91;B&#93; == C then C is the dominating definition at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   block B</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; if BlockLabels&#91;B&#93; == nullptr then we haven&#39;t seen B yet</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; if BlockLabels&#91;B&#93; == B then:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   - B is a join point of disjoint paths from X, or,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   - B is an immediate successor of X (initial value), or,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   - B is X</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericsyncdependenceanalysis/#a823a5b27036e0b5096c257e597133085"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericsyncdependenceanalysis/#a823a5b27036e0b5096c257e597133085">BlockLabelMap</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;const BlockT &#42;, const BlockT &#42;&gt;</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Information discovered by the sync dependence analysis for each</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\brief Computes divergent join points and cycle exits caused by branch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// divergence in \\p Term.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CausedJoin = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LoweredFloorIdx = FloorIdx;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the current block is the header of a reducible cycle that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// contains the divergent branch, then the label should be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// propagated to the cycle exits. Such a header is the &quot;last</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// possible join&quot; of any disjoint paths within this cycle. This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// prevents detection of spurious joins at the entries of any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// irreducible child cycles.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This conclusion about the header is true for any choice of DFS:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   If some DFS has a reducible cycle C with header H, then for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   any other DFS, H is the header of a cycle C&#39; that is a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   superset of C. For a divergent branch inside the subgraph</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   C, any join node inside C is either H, or some node</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   encountered without passing through H.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> getReducibleParent = &#91;&amp;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/divergencepropagator/#ae07136789e9c05c9e4c4e926edc670a6">BlockT</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>) -&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/divergencepropagator/#ae1a44d6de22b0cd39412dcb2b3992a51">CycleT</a> &#42; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/divergencepropagator/#a058ad83af142fe89600382d7ebd6d043">CyclePOT</a>.isReducibleCycleHeader(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;BlockCycle = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/divergencepropagator/#a79d4b0e0dde4d0ce765038ab1b0b3eeb">CI</a>.getCycle(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BlockCycle-&gt;contains(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/divergencepropagator/#a3ab9f4c02e1305316eef4eb1ec559f90">DivTermBlock</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BlockCycle;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;BlockCycle = getReducibleParent(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BlockT &#42;, 4&gt;</a> BlockCycleExits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><span class="doxyHighlight">        BlockCycle-&gt;getExitBlocks(BlockCycleExits);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;BlockCycleExit : BlockCycleExits) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><span class="doxyHighlight">          CausedJoin |= <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/divergencepropagator/#ac9b09a5db2a5ebed6739fad98a47b232">visitCycleExitEdge</a>(&#42;BlockCycleExit, &#42;Label);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><span class="doxyHighlight">          LoweredFloorIdx =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><span class="doxyHighlight">              std::min&lt;int&gt;(LoweredFloorIdx, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/divergencepropagator/#a058ad83af142fe89600382d7ebd6d043">CyclePOT</a>.getIndex(BlockCycleExit));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;SuccBlock : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a26e2a938b431eaa6eca2beaa96410c9d">successors</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><span class="doxyHighlight">          CausedJoin |= <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/divergencepropagator/#af14ecd129e3da10ff3276dca2149a1c8">visitEdge</a>(&#42;SuccBlock, &#42;Label);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><span class="doxyHighlight">          LoweredFloorIdx =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericuniformityanalysisimpl/#ad0294653387245dc39725f57be0ebdc9"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericuniformityanalysisimpl/#ad0294653387245dc39725f57be0ebdc9">GenericUniformityAnalysisImpl&lt;ContextT&gt;::addUniformOverride</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericuniformityanalysisimpl/#a484916a520559a5fc26918abec93866c">InstructionT</a> &amp;Instr) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813"><span class="doxyHighlight">  UniformOverrides.insert(&amp;Instr);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="815"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="816"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mark as divergent all external uses of values defined in \\p DefCycle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="817"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="818"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A value V defined by a block B inside \\p DefCycle may be used outside the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="819"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cycle only if the use is a PHI in some exit block, or B dominates some exit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="820"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block. Thus, we check uses as follows:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="821"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="822"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Check all PHIs in all exit blocks for inputs defined inside \\p DefCycle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="823"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - For every block B inside \\p DefCycle that dominates at least one exit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="824"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   block, check all uses outside \\p DefCycle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="825"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="826"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: This function does not distinguish between divergent and uniform</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="827"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// exits. For each divergent exit, only the values that are live at that exit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="828"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// need to be propagated as divergent at their use outside the cycle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="829"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ContextT&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="830"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GenericUniformityAnalysisImpl&lt;ContextT&gt;::analyzeCycleExitDivergence(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="831"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CycleT &amp;DefCycle) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="832"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BlockT &#42;&gt;</a> Exits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833"><span class="doxyHighlight">  DefCycle.getExitBlocks(Exits);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="834"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Exit : Exits) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="835"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Phi : Exit-&gt;phis()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="836"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (usesValueFromCycle(Phi, DefCycle)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="838"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="839"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="840"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="841"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="842"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;BB : DefCycle.blocks()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="843"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a61d13d6824ec46c31260a4fd0997eda0">llvm::any&#95;of</a>(Exits,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="844"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     &#91;&amp;&#93;(BlockT &#42;Exit) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DT.dominates(BB, Exit); &#125;))</span></CodeLine>
